sleep de 1000 us

X10010110110011100000101101
X00101101100111000001011011

counter = 1!!!!

void LeRFID(){
    bool chave = false;
    bool teste = false;
    if (gpio_get(DATA1)||gpio_get(DATA0))
    {
        chave= true;
        counter = 1;
        while (chave == true)
        {
            
            if (gpio_get(DATA1))
            {
                counter++;
                wiegand[counter] = '1';
                sleep_us(1700);
            }
            if(gpio_get(DATA0)){
                counter++;
                wiegand[counter] = '0';
                sleep_us(1700);
            }
            if (counter == 26)
            {
                
                counter = 1;
              
                printf("\n%s",wiegand);
                wiegand[27] = "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX";
                chave = false;
                sleep_us(890);
            
                break;   
            }   
        }   
    }
}
